thread.section_title: Rome Times Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First Class Service
thread.title_full: First Class Service - Review of Rome Times Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ppeterleitner
title: First Class Service
text:
I stayed for 8 nights at this boutique hotel and every single aspect of this experience was "a class act." The room was spotless, up-to-date, and all the comforts of home. The bathroom and shower were spotless and modern, as well. The staff was professional, multi-lingual, accommodating, kind, and attentive. The dining services are also superior and I had some of the best Chianti of my trip in this hotel. The pictures that are on-line are actually representative of this hotel. The breakfast was amazing; such a variety! The Wifi does work and there is in-room coffee maker and the mini-bar is few for the "first time."
Room Tip: Ask for room closer to the roof-top deck, quieter. See more room tips
